advisories.impact: An app may be able to read sensitive location information
advisories.description: A privacy issue was addressed with improved private data redaction for log entries.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: pattern-f (@pattern_F_) of Ant Security Light-Year Lab

advisories.impact: A sandboxed process may be able to circumvent sandbox restrictions
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to modify protected parts of the file system
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved data protection.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to read sensitive location information
advisories.description: A privacy issue was addressed with improved private data redaction for log entries.

advisories.impact: A user in a privileged network position may be able to leak sensitive information
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: Multiple issues in curl
advisories.description: Multiple issues were addressed by updating curl.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to read sensitive location information
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.

advisories.impact: Processing a font file may lead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploited against versions of iOS released before iOS 15.7.1.
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved handling of caches.

cves.credit: Apple, Valentin Pashkov, Mikhail Vinogradov, Georgy Kucherin (@kucher1n), Leonid Bezvershenko (@bzvr_), and Boris Larin (@oct0xor) of Kaspersky

advisories.impact: Processing a file may lead to unexpected app termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: A remote user may be able to cause a denial-of-service
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: A remote user may be able to cause unexpected system termination or corrupt kernel memory
advisories.description: A buffer overflow issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A use-after-free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: An integer overflow was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: 香农的三蹦子 of Pangu Lab

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A use-after-free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

cves.credit: Kaitao Xie and Xiaolong Bai of Alibaba Group

advisories.impact: An app may be able to modify sensitive kernel state. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploited against versions of iOS released before iOS 15.7.1.
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Valentin Pashkov, Mikhail Vinogradov, Georgy Kucherin (@kucher1n), Leonid Bezvershenko (@bzvr_), and Boris Larin (@oct0xor) of Kaspersky

advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: A remote user may be able to cause a denial-of-service
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to gain root privileges
advisories.description: A path handling issue was addressed with improved validation.

cves.credit: Zhipeng Huo (@R3dF09) of Tencent Security Xuanwu Lab (xlab.tencent.com)

advisories.impact: An app may be able to cause a denial-of-service
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: A S/MIME encrypted email may be inadvertently sent unencrypted
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved state management of S/MIME encrypted emails.

cves.credit: Taavi Eomäe from Zone Media OÜ

advisories.impact: An app may be able to bypass Privacy preferences
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved validation of symlinks.

advisories.impact: Processing a 3D model may result in disclosure of process memory
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Mickey Jin (@patch1t), and Michael DePlante (@izobashi) of Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.impact: Processing an image may result in disclosure of process memory
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An app may cause unexpected app termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved validation.

cves.credit: Jonathan Bar Or of Microsoft, Emanuele Cozzi of Microsoft, and Michael Pearse of Microsoft

advisories.impact: An app may be able to modify protected parts of the file system
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by removing the vulnerable code.

advisories.impact: A sandboxed process may be able to circumvent sandbox restrictions
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.impact: A remote user may be able to cause a denial-of-service
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access SSH passphrases
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with additional restrictions on the observability of app states.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to modify protected parts of the file system
advisories.description: A permissions issue was addressed with additional restrictions.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to fingerprint the user
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by removing the vulnerable code.

advisories.impact: A shortcut may be able to modify sensitive Shortcuts app settings
advisories.description: An access issue was addressed with improved access restrictions.

advisories.impact: Processing a file may lead to a denial-of-service or potentially disclose memory contents
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to gain root privileges
advisories.description: A race condition was addressed with improved state handling.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to bypass Privacy preferences
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by adding additional SQLite logging restrictions.

cves.credit: Gergely Kalman (@gergely_kalman), and Wojciech Regula of SecuRing (wojciechregula.blog)

advisories.impact: An app may be able to bypass Privacy preferences
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: Multiple issues in Vim
advisories.description: Multiple issues were addressed by updating Vim.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to determine a user’s current location
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved redaction of sensitive information.
